About the Author¶

I’m Channith, a Django user and developer. មិនយល់ មុិចបានមិនកើត? My research interests are in ther areas of

  • Networking

  • Software Defined Networking (SDN)
  • Cloud, Openstack
  • Machine Learning (ML)
